attributes.additional_details:
HRH the Prince of Wales has on multiple occasions expressed the will of the British people to see traditional architecture in the United Kingdom protected against a torrent of modernization which has so damaged our cultural landscape and beauty.

We feel that all new building developments should conform to a set of government rules and regulations to keep in with traditional Georgian, Tutor and Victorian architectural design.

We should utilize the current resources and technology we have to instead of building ugly modernized structures, to instead construct traditional structures.

If the Georgians and Tudors could build such structures then so can we there are no excuses, with our knowledge we can even build better.

We believe this will not only protect and restore our architectural heritage but also improve the day to day lives of the British people and even attract more tourists to see Britain.
